originalText.text: Sarah and her team went above and beyond to make our bedroom look incredible. My husband and I hired Sarah to do a full makeover of our bedroom with all new furniture and décor.  From the minute we met Sarah we felt confident that she would listen to our needs, understand our taste/style, and work within our budget. During the process Sarah acted quickly on the feedback we shared, editing designs based on our preferences.  The finished product looks absolutely incredible and we are thrilled with our new bedroom. We would absolutely recommend Sarah & Stylish Spaces to anyone!

text.text: Sarah and her team went above and beyond to make our bedroom look incredible. My husband and I hired Sarah to do a full makeover of our bedroom with all new furniture and décor. We would absolutely recommend Sarah & Stylish Spaces to anyone!

originalText.text: Sarah did a fantastic job organizing our kitchen and entryway closets upon our move to a new apt.  She was a pleasure to work with and very efficient.  Following the organizing sessions, our kitchen and closets are more organized than they have ever been in other spaces, and everything has a designated space so that we can maintain the organization without difficulty. The process was well-thought through down to small details such as separating each family member’s gloves into its own space.  As another example, the height of numerous shelves in the kitchen was readjusted to enable all the glassware to fit perfectly in one cabinet and all the dishes and bowls in another (see photos).

originalText.text: Sarah did a great job reimagining how we organize our home and gave us a detailed plan. We have made about 25% of the suggested changes so far and those areas are so much calmer!  We felt really comfortable having her go through our apartment and wouldn't hesitate to recommend her!

text.text: Sarah did a great job reimagining how we organize our home and gave us a detailed plan. We have made about 25% of the suggested changes so far and those areas are so much calmer!  We felt really comfortable having her go through our apartment and wouldn't hesitate to recommend her!

originalText.text: Sarah is beyond amazing at what she does - and so kind, patient, and thoughtful while doing it. Truly a magician - she transformed a traditional 2 bedroom NYC apartment into a beautiful home studio to work and function out of. I have never felt so organized in my life - forever grateful & couldn't recommend more!

text.text: Sarah is beyond amazing at what she does - and so kind, patient, and thoughtful while doing it. Truly a magician - she transformed a traditional 2 bedroom NYC apartment into a beautiful home studio to work and function out of. I have never felt so organized in my life - forever grateful & couldn't recommend more!

originalText.text: Sarah is AMAZING - both at her job, and as a person. She was incredible in getting my entire apartment organized and incorporating style into it as well, which was very important to me. The tidiness aspect was just as important to me as it looking “aesthetic”and Sarah achieved that perfectly. She took the time to listen to everything I wanted to get done and she was lovely to work with - Sarah is very personable, easy to talk to, and efficient in getting everything done in as short as time as possible. She takes cost-efficiency for her clients seriously, and she exceeded all my expectations. Thank you so much Sarah - absolutely worth it and 100% an investment everyone should consider.
